subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb of Germany sprinted to win the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Alberto Contador kept the leader’s red jersey with four days to go.
snippet: John Degenkolb of Germany sprinted to win the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Alberto Contador kept the leader’s red jersey with four days to go.
